protocol_name: Selection of stable transformants in Ostreococcus tauri and Bathycoccus prasinos
protocol_name_html: Selection of stable transformants in Ostreococcus tauri and Bathycoccus prasinos
description: This protocol  describes the selection and growth of stable transformants in semi solid agarose medium. Developped initially for Ostreococcus tauri, it also works for Bathycoccus.
protocol_affiliation: Laboratoire d'Oceanographie Microbienne. Banyuls sur Mer

groups.group_name: Protist Research to Optimize Tools in Genetics (PROT-G)

authors_list.name: Francois-Yves bouget
authors_list.affiliation: Laboratoire d'Oceanographie Microbienne. Banyuls sur Mer

components.data: Autoclave a solution of 2.1% low melting agarose in H2O. Keep at 65-90 °C in a water bath.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Autoclave a solution of 2.1% low melting agarose in H2O. Keep at 65-90 °C in a water bath.

components.data: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium

components.data: Add 1 ml of LMP agarose to the 9 ml in one of the tubes. Close the tube, and mix gently  by inverting.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1 ml of LMP agarose to the 9 ml in one of the tubes. Close the tube, and mix gently  by inverting.

components.data: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium

components.data: Add 0.5 ml of overnight transformed cells (see protocol on transient transformation), quickly mix and gently pour into the plate. pay attention to avoid bubles . Repeat this process for all tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 0.5 ml of overnight transformed cells (see protocol on transient transformation), quickly mix and gently pour into the plate. pay attention to avoid bubles . Repeat this process for all tubes.

components.data: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium

components.data: Let the plates dry open in the flowhood for about one hour, so that the agarose solidifies.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Let the plates dry open in the flowhood for about one hour, so that the agarose solidifies.

components.data: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium

components.data: Close the plates and transfer them to large square Petri dishes. Add wet paper towel to keep the chamber humid.  Seal the square plates with medical tape. Place the square plates in the incubator for about 10 days.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Close the plates and transfer them to large square Petri dishes. Add wet paper towel to keep the chamber humid.  Seal the square plates with medical tape. Place the square plates in the incubator for about 10 days.

components.data: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium

components.data: For each transformation prepare 8 Petri dishes (55 mm diameter) and 8 x 15 ml tubes each containing 9 ml of ASW plus the required selection. (CloNat at 2mg/ml or G418 at 1.5 mg/ml).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: For each transformation prepare 8 Petri dishes (55 mm diameter) and 8 x 15 ml tubes each containing 9 ml of ASW plus the required selection. (CloNat at 2mg/ml or G418 at 1.5 mg/ml).

components.data: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Inclusion of cells in semi-solid agarose medium

components.data: Transformant colonies should appear after 10 to 21 days. Pick colonies using with cut-off yellow tips. Suck out the green colony. Take care not to include any cells from neighbouring colonies.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transformant colonies should appear after 10 to 21 days. Pick colonies using with cut-off yellow tips. Suck out the green colony. Take care not to include any cells from neighbouring colonies.

components.data: Transfer the cells to 0,2 ml of ASW medium containing the selection (CloNat or G418), in 96  wells microplate.  Allow cultures to grow for 7 days in the culture incubator.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the cells to 0,2 ml of ASW medium containing the selection (CloNat or G418), in 96  wells microplate.  Allow cultures to grow for 7 days in the culture incubator.

components.data: After one week transfer to 20 ml culture flasks and grow for 7 to 10 days. Stable integration into the genome by random insertion or homologous recombination  can be detected using PCR (see Lozano et al, Plant Journal 2014). When the transgene containsa luciferase reporter, a first screening can be performed directly  by measuring luminescene in a microplate luminometer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After one week transfer to 20 ml culture flasks and grow for 7 to 10 days. Stable integration into the genome by random insertion or homologous recombination  can be detected using PCR (see Lozano et al, Plant Journal 2014). When the transgene containsa luciferase reporter, a first screening can be performed directly  by measuring luminescene in a microplate luminometer.
